kv12.9:5.5: Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.9:6.9: amanussitthiyā tiracchānagatitthiyā nāgakaññāya methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, ajeḷakaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya … tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
kv12.9:6.12: Hañci diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv12.9:7.1: Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:7.3: Arahato pahīnā duggati, arahā āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:7.6: diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike sadde …
kv12.9:7.13: Arahato pahīnā duggati, arahā tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
kv12.9:8.1: Arahato pahīnā duggati, na ca arahā āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:8.3: Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, na ca diṭṭhisampanno puggalo āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyāti?
kv12.9:8.6: arahato pahīnā duggati, na ca arahā āpāyike sadde … pe …
kv12.9:8.14: amanussitthiyā tiracchānagatitthiyā nāgakaññāya methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, ajeḷakaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, kukkuṭasūkaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyya, hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya … pe … tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
kv12.9:8.18: Diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, na ca diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tittiravaṭṭakamorakapiñjaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyyāti?
kv12.9:9.9: Tena hi diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggatīti.
